function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inaccurate testing methods for COVID-19 may result in the failure to identify asymptomatic or incubating individuals.","Impact":"Unidentified individuals may spread the virus, leading to outbreaks in the workplace.","Mitigation":"Implement regular and accurate testing methods for COVID-19 and combine with other preventive measures such as masking and social distancing.","Technologies":"RT-PCR, NAAT, Ag-RDTs, Antibody assay","People":"Workers, travelers, individuals entering work areas","Owner":"Health authorities, employers, testing facilities"},{"Description":"Lack of daily health screening and assessment may lead to undetected COVID-19 cases in the offshore workplace.","Impact":"Undetected cases may lead to the spread of COVID-19 among workers in the offshore workplace.","Mitigation":"Mandate daily body temperature screening and self-health assessment for all workers in the offshore workplace.","Technologies":"Body temperature screening, self-health assessment","People":"Workers in the offshore workplace","Owner":"Employers, health and safety authorities"},{"Description":"Reliance on lower sensitivity testing methods may result in missed COVID-19 cases, allowing infected individuals to enter the workplace.","Impact":"Infected individuals may spread the virus in the workplace, increasing the risk of COVID-19 outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Prioritize the use of highly sensitive testing methods such as RT-PCR and NAAT for workers in enclosure areas like oil and gas offshore platforms.","Technologies":"RT-PCR, NAAT, Ag-RDTs, Antibody assay","People":"Workers in enclosure areas like oil and gas offshore platforms","Owner":"Employers, health authorities"}]}
